channel.title: [PI]How to make server detect you have killed a monster to advance quest?
channel.description:
My title says it all. I want it to detect I have killed a monster to advance the quest. Kinda like, I kill a jogre, int of the quest becomes +1.
Thanks, Arham

item.title: [PI]How to make server detect you have killed a monster to advance quest?
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

NPCHandler.java (src>server>model>npcs)

Search for:

There will be something like this.

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { c.randomPoints += 1; }

Make it something like:

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID && RuneMysteries == 5) { c.RuneMysteries += 1; }

Make a variable that will count up if you have the right requirments and kill the monster.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]How to make server detect you have killed a monster to advance quest?
